support-project-form.disclaimer: a{currency}p tokens can be claimed on Ethereum if {project} wins a Polkadot Parachain slot auction. a{currency}p will enable claiming daily rewards on Ethereum as well as potentially an initial airdrop reward after winning a Polkadot Parachain slot auction.

tooltips.available-balance: Make sure to leave at least {value} {token} existential deposit ({network} requirement) on your wallet when contributing.
tooltips.connect-polkadot-wallet: Please connect your Polkadot wallet in order to continue

trading-cockpit.eth-unstake-err: Unstaking will be enabled during phase 1.5 of Ethereum 2.0. The release date of phase 1.5 is expected sometime between 2021 and 2022.

header.title: Trading cockpit
header.aethb-info: aETHb is an ETH reward earning bond.

fair-value.title: Fair Value
fair-value.tooltip: The fair value represents the ratio at which users can stake/unstake one token. For reward-earning (rebasing) tokens, the value should always be 1 to 1 because user's wallet balance increase in a daily basis, simulating as such earned staking rewards.
fair-value.tooltip-aethc: The fair value represents the staking value of 1 aETHc, which should always increase and be above 1 ETH as ETH2 staking rewards are accumulated in Ankr's staking pool. At phase 1.5 of Ethereum 2.0, unstaking ETH will become possible and staked ETH can be redeemed at fair value.

table.name: Name
table.difference-tip: This indicates the difference between market price and fair value, which is the amount of tokens received when you stake/unstake.
table.est-price-tip: Price difference in comparison with the best price that you can get.

stats.apy-tooltip: Annual percentage yield (or APY) shows the rate of return you earn over a year including the effect of compounding.

success.title: Stake successful
success.description: You will be able to see your {token} exposure on Ankr Earn Dashboard.

stake-bnb-dashboard.title: BNB Staking
stake-bnb-dashboard.unstake-eta: You will receive BNB in about 3-4 days.

tooltip.apy:
The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) represents the average annualized earned BNB over the last 7 days, net of delegation fees from Binance Validator nodes.

Ankr Earn fee is 0%.

When there are at least 300 pending BNB rewards, earned BNB will be staked to generate compounding effect.
tooltip.fee: As unstaking BNB tokens is a gas and time consuming process requiring sending several transactions to the BNB smart-contracts deployed in Ethereum, Ankr Earn covers the gas fee cost and charge a modest fee in Ankr to compensate its expenses. BNB tokens will therefore be transfered to your wallet automatically as soon as unstake process is completed without any subsequent additional costs.

validation.is-not-enough-fee: {value} ANKR is not enough for unstaking fee. Please, buy ANKR

stake-bnb.stake-info: Stake at least 1 BNB on Ethereum network and claim the same amount of aBNBb liquid staking tokens (aBNBb) on Binance Smart Chain network (BEP-20 token). Your aBNBb balance will increase on a daily basis, simulating as such your aBNBb staking rewards.
stake-bnb.bnb-tooltip-body: aBNBb is a redeemable token. aBNBb can be redeemed at fair value into BNB tokens anytime after 3-4 days unbonding period.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.answer-1: Polygon Liquid Staking offers instant liquidity for your staked MATIC. When you stake MATIC, you will mint and claim aMATICb tokens. These new tokens can be used with DeFi platforms to earn additional layers of rewards.
faq.question-2: What is the minimum amount of MATIC I can stake?
faq.answer-2: The minimum amount you can stake is {value} MATIC.
faq.question-3: How soon after staking will I begin to receive rewards?
faq.answer-3: Your aMATICb balance will increase daily with every rebase. This rebase reflects the staking rewards you have earned for the period.
faq.answer-4: The aMATICb tokens you keep in your wallet will gradually increase in quantity to reflect the staking rewards you earn. This happens daily with a process called “rebasing” (adjusting the supply of tokens) to deliver your appropriate staking rewards.
faq.question-5: What determines the amount of reward I receive with each rebase?
faq.answer-5: This depends on the average staking period of Ankr Earn validator nodes, as well as MATIC total supply and size of the future instant liquidity pool (an indirect cost for aMATICb holders).
faq.question-6: If I unstake, is there a lead time required for this to happen, or is it immediate?
faq.answer-6: You will need to wait for a period of around 3-4 days. This is because the blockchain needs to undergo 80 “checkpoints” to process this transaction.
faq.question-7: Are there any docs about the MATIC staking and how I set up my wallet etc.?
faq.answer-7: Yes, you can access a more in-depth user guide here.

stake-polygon-dashboard.title: MATIC Staking
stake-polygon-dashboard.unstake-eta: You will receive MATIC in about 3-4 days.

tooltip.apy:
The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) represents the average annualized earned MATIC over the last 7 days, net of delegation fees from Polygon Validator nodes.

Ankr Earn fee is 0%.

When there are at least 300 pending MATIC rewards, earned MATIC will be staked to generate compounding effect.
tooltip.fee: As unstaking MATIC tokens is a gas and time consuming process requiring sending several transactions to the MATIC smart-contracts deployed in Ethereum, Ankr Earn covers the gas fee cost and charge a modest fee in Ankr to compensate its expenses.  MATIC tokens will therefore be transfered to your wallet automatically as soon as unstake process is completed without any subsequent additional costs.

validation.is-not-enough-fee: {value} ANKR is not enough for unstaking fee. Please, buy ANKR

stake-polygon.stake-info: Stake at least 1 MATIC on Ethereum network and claim the same amount of aMATICb liquid staking tokens (aMATICb) on Ethereum network (ERC-20 token). Your aMATICb balance will increase on a daily basis, simulating as such your aMATICb staking rewards.
stake-polygon.matic-tooltip-body: aMATICb is a redeemable token. aMATICb can be redeemed at fair value into MATIC tokens anytime after 3-4 days unbonding period.

stake-fantom.ftm-tooltip-body: aFTMb is a redeemable token. aFTMb can be redeemed at fair value into FTM tokens anytime after unbonding period.

eth2Swap.title: ETH2 Swap
eth2Swap.info: Swap ETH liquid staking tokens at fair value any time.

tooltips.aETHb: Ankr Reward-Earning Staked ETH (aETHb) is a rebasing token. When holding aETHb, its balance will increase on a daily basis proportional to your ETH2 staking rewards. Therefore, the ratio of aETHb vs. ETH is always 1:1.
tooltips.aETHc: Ankr Reward-Bearing Staked ETH (aETHc) is a reward-bearing token.Its value compared with ETH represents the redemption value of aETHc, increasing over time to reflect ETH2 staking rewards earned.

eth2Swap.successInfo: Check out your new {token} exposure on the Ankr Earn Dashboard any time.

unstake-dialog.title: How many {token} do you want to redeem?
unstake-dialog.unstake-fee-tooltip: As unstaking MATIC tokens is a gas and time consuming process requiring sending several transactions to the MATIC smart contracts deployed in Ethereum, Ankr Earn covers the gas fee cost and charge a modest fee in Ankr to compensate its expenses. MATIC tokens will therefore be transferred to your wallet automatically as soon as unstake process is completed without any subsequent additional costs.
